body_html:
@captainmeta4 has now blocked me. Of course he's an admin so he can still see my posts and reply to them, and indeed he is still doing so. Therefore the block only serves one purpose: so I can't reply back and give my side of the situation! His word will now be the final and only one from now on, and I assume he has done this because he's afraid of me exposing him and his discord shenanigans.

This happened right after he threatened to ban me from the site for dissenting a second time. Daddy spez would be proud. If I end up banned, we know the truth.

I've now blocked him back. Unfortunately he is an admin and can get around it, and I'm sure he will like he does with guild exiles. But it serves a symbolic purpose.
title: captainmeta4 blocked me so I can't reply to his posts (but he still replies to mine)

His word will now be the final and only one from now on, and I assume he has done this because he's afraid of me exposing him and his discord shenanigans.

This happened right after he threatened to ban me from the site for dissenting a second time. Daddy spez would be proud. If I end up banned, we know the truth.

I've now blocked him back. Unfortunately he is an admin and can get around it, and I'm sure he will like he does with guild exiles. But it serves a symbolic purpose.
post.title: captainmeta4 blocked me so I can't reply to his posts (but he still replies to mine)

body:
@JosephGoebbels and @muyuu too:

It looks like captainmeta4's excuse for removing those comments was the standard one when they can't find an actual reason: "sexualizing minors". That's what the poster of those comments @AntiAmerikkka was permabanned for anyway. I saw what I saw, and I know you did too, it was criticism of the admins, not child porn. Of course probably no one else will believe me now, since it's censored and the admins can just say it was whatever they want people to think it was and everyone will just automatically believe them, because they're the admins so they must be right.

body: Just like they said I used alts to mod more than 10 guilds. I grew suspicious with the @sfrohne ban, that was cheap but I came to realize, what better reason to label? It destroys credibility just by labeling that. No one would ever go to bat for you. You don't get a voice, no hearing, no appeals, you're just gone. And if they say you sexualized minors? Who's to question it? It's a guilty until proven innocent charge.
